nodes.label: greet
utterances: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! How can I help you today?

nodes.label: request_booking_details
utterances: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please provide your booking reference and the new preferred dates?

nodes.label: confirm_reschedule
utterances: Thank you. I have rescheduled your flight to next Monday. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Thank you. I have rescheduled your flight to Tuesday. Is there anything else I can help you with?

nodes.label: exit
utterances: You're welcome! If you need any further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. Have a safe journey!

nodes.label: provide_new_reference
utterances: Of course. Please provide the new booking reference and the new preferred dates.

nodes.label: cancel_flight
utterances: I'm sorry to hear that you need to cancel. Your flight has been canceled. If you need further assistance, please let me know.

nodes.label: process_refund
utterances: Understood. I have initiated a refund to your original payment method. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

topic: Rescheduling a flight due to a medical emergency

I would like a refund instead of rescheduling.
Understood. I have initiated a refund to your original payment method. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
